content: The reason that software tools must be under configuration control is:

choices.A: Future modifications must use the initial tool version in order to assure compatibility
choices.B: To provide a quick check on tool upgrade status
choices.C: To establish a link with the tool representative throughout the modification process
choices.D: To provide status reports to upper management

content: A concurrent process model that includes major technical activities, tasks, and their associated states has what additional characteristic?

choices.C: Technical activities are followed in close approximations
choices.D: All activities exist concurrently, but reside in different states
choices.A: Events occur concurrently and are coordinated by a central process
choices.B: Tasks are allocated based on priorities set by the project team

content: The plans for the physical off-site storage of software records would most likely be found in the:
One of the main inputs to the software build process is:
A review of test results to ascertain that all functionality and performance has been validated is called a:
An accepted definition of a software baseline is:

choices.A: A listing of all the Cis on a deliverable tape
choices.B: An arrangement of parts as embodied in a software product

content: Verifying that all the components in a software release and its documentation are in agreement is called a:
A software build is a process of:

choices.C: Developing a software module from design specification
choices.D: Creating application binaries for a software release

content: An organization elects to conduct daily incremental backups, cycled weekly, with a full weekly backup being shipped off-site. In case of a disaster, such as a fire, what is the maximum amount of data that would be lost?
What is the name of the software library which is used to hold newly created or modified software items?
Which of the following statements regarding status accounting would be considered FALSE?

choices.A: Software status accounting places a significant focus on the costs relative to SCI changes
choices.B: Status accounting is also called configuration status reporting by many organizations
choices.C: Status accounting should maintain continuous records of the status of all baseline items
choices.D: Status accounting is an element of configuration management

content: Which of the following is an appropriate definition for a software program patch?

choices.A: A controlled collection of software and related documentation
choices.B: The modification to an object program by deleting a portion of the existing code
choices.C: An aggregate of hardware and software that is treated as a single entity
choices.D: The modification of an object program without recompiling the source program

content: The test design method that involves seeding errors into a program is known as:
Bottom-up testing requires which of the following conditions?

choices.A: All software must exist at the sub-module level
choices.B: Testing must begin at a terminal module
choices.C: All terminal modules must be tested before testing any higher modules
choices.D: Special drivers are required only for critical functions of missing modules

content: In an operating environment, the difference between functional and performance testing is that functional tests evaluate the:

choices.D: Features and capabilities of the system

content: A module is presented by its author to a review group and the author receives immediate feedback. This is known as what kind of software inspection?
White box testing is distinguished from black box testing by:

choices.A: Use of the control structure to derive test cases
choices.B: Demonstrating that program requirements have been met
choices.C: Letting software engineers test from the bottom up
choices.D: Finding more incorrect or missing function errors

content: Test cases should satisfy which of the following criteria?

choices.A: Combine as many tests in one test case as possible
choices.B: Collect all available data on the function being tested
choices.C: Have at least a 50% chance of catching an error
choices.D: Make program failures obvious and likely to be detected
